page.title: 10HOME LIFE 1
page.content: My name is Kelly Davis.I am 8 years old.I have a brother called Ben.He is one year old.The first thing I did this morning was wash and get dressed.Then I went downstairs and have my breakfast.Today I had Weetabix.Then I put my coat on and shoes and then I go over to the shop for 2 cartons of pop.Today it was raspberry flavour.Then I put my sandwiches in the sandwich box with the pop and get my bag packed.Then we get my brother ready for school we pass through a park.When I get to school I take my sandwich box into the dining hall.We all line up.When our teacher comes she sends us in.The first thing we do is read for about 10-15mins and after that we do S.R.A. till playtime.After play we do maths till dinnertime.For dinner I have sandwiches and chocolate.When I leave
